item.title: scregcp
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env bash # screenshots stuff # TODO: docs function help_and_exit { if [ -n "${1}" ]; then echo "${1}" fi cat <<-EOF Usage: scregcp [-h|-s] [<screenshots_base_folder>] Take screenshot of a whole screen or a specified region, save it to a specified folder (current folder is default) and copy it to a clipboard. -h - print help and exit -s - take a screenshot of a screen region EOF if [ -n "${1}" ]; then exit 1 fi exit 0 } if [ "${1}" == '-h' ]; then help_and_exit elif [ "${1:0:1}" == '-' ]; then if [ "${1}" !
